name: cafe-com-vendas-landing
description: Landing page for Café com Vendas event - an intimate business event for female entrepreneurs in Portugal

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tokens:build && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && eleventy
scripts.start: npm run tokens:build && TAILWIND_CONTENT="src/**/*.{njk,html,md,js}" npm run build:css && npm run build:js:dev && eleventy --serve
scripts.dev: npm run tokens:build && TAILWIND_CONTENT="src/**/*.{njk,html,md,js}" npm run build:css && npm run build:js:dev && eleventy --serve --watch

author: Café com Vendas
